name: Dogchamp Creator
description:
Make yourself a dogchamp to compete in the fight to become the SUPREME DOGCHAMP!

Well, not yet.

I've halted production of this game for a while, but have made the decision to release what I've made so far. What I've made so far is an epic character creator!

Yeah, ok, so you can't use the character in gameplay yet, but why not give it a try and see what cool character you come up with? Maybe you can just make one to use as a discord emote if you're good at photoshopping black backgrounds out.

Since the fighting portion of the game isn't made yet, the options on the right of the screen are pretty obsolete. But, that's ok! Still, go wild! Make something cool!

This is really more of a portfolio piece than anything,

BUT IT'S PRETTY NEAT!

Music in game was made with CodeParade's Neural Network
